verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: declared] [ARG1: the Kim Jong Un summit an historic success Tuesday that will lead to the denuclearization of North Korea] , [ARGM-TMP: even as critics pointed out that a joint statement signed by the leaders lacks specifics] .

President Donald Trump declared the Kim Jong Un summit an historic success Tuesday that [V: will] lead to the denuclearization of North Korea , even as critics pointed out that a joint statement signed by the leaders lacks specifics .
